text: Kyösti Kallio (10 April 1873 - 19 December 1940) was the fourth President of Finland. He was president from 1937 to 1940. He is the only Finnish president who did not have any higher education. Kallio was born in Ylivieska. He died in Helsinki. == References == == Other websites == Category:1873 births Category:Presidents of Finland Category:1940 deaths
title: Kyösti Kallio
